Reviews.Title: “Great anniversary weekend!!!!”
Reviews.Author: delione
Reviews.Content: We came to this hotel because it is #1 on Trip advisor, and it definitely deserves the 1st place!!! The rooms are beautiful, comfortable, equipped with everything you may need, with a great style on its decor. We had wine by the pool, and Derek (the wonderful barman) made us feel right at home with his awesome service! We are definitely going back but next time with our kids! Thanks!!!!!

Reviews.Title: “Lives up to the hype!”
Reviews.Author: alyx258
Reviews.Content: My husband and I stayed here for three days, two nights. I found the hotel on tripadvisor when it was rated just #2, but during our stay it rose up to #1 and we can see why. Check in was quick, all the workers were friendly and greeted us every single time. The suite itself was excellent with a fully equipped kitchen (pots, pans, dishes, glasses, silverware included) and washer/dryer. I was already impressed but my husband (who can never sleep well at any hotel) had a restful sleep as the pillows and bed itself were extremely comfortable. We also loved the free smoothies, waters, dove ice cream bars and chocolates that seemed to be replenished by an invisible hand; the maid service was so inconspicuous. Overall, awesome hotel and we can't wait to visit again with family and friends.

Reviews.Title: “An all around review after staying for a week”
Reviews.Author: Sfloves2travel
Reviews.Content: Just got back from visiting the Santa Maria Suites for a week. I traveled with my parents and family and we chose to cancel our reservation at the Mariott after reading TripAdvisor reviews. Here is a thorough review of our entire stay: Upon check in, we were greeted by Ken who checked us in. We helped ourselves to lemonade in the main office and had a seamless check in. We had booked the cheaper room rate online with the 'garden view' and smaller beds. I suppose we had a garden view although most of it consisted of the parking lot and street. The hotel says that they are queen size beds and I still cant decide if they are. I agree with other reviewers that the room sizes were very small - think european small, but nevertheless everything was immaculately clean. There was a wine fridge, large fridge, oven, microwave, 2 cup coffee maker (only 2 cup coffee maker for a 2 bedroom suite?), toaster, blender, dishwasher, the works. Every appliance was top of the line and immaculately clean. My parents, who were disappointed with the size of the beds, that the suite was on level 2 and 3 with stair access only, the fact they didn't have a jacuzzi, and without an ocean or pool view (mind you, they didn't remember that they knew there was no ocean view during the placement of the reservation) initially requested to change to a different suite and Ken was gracious and accomodating. He had much more patience with them than I did! In the end, we elected to stay where we had been assigned originally and it worked out just fine. The beds were comfy and clean although we each had a backache the next day when we woke up. They charged us an extra $25 a day for having an additonal guest come and stay for a few days with us, which is fine, but it would have been nice for him to get his own towels and not have had to use pool towels. The pool was very clean and Derek was fantastic. Derek is there M-F from 10-530ish and he makes excellent drinks and can arrange for anything you want. He recommended Salute's on the beach and the food there was so amazing we went back several times. In addition to making amazing drinks and continuing to pour the complimenary Woodbridge Mondavi wine between 4-530, he made our reservations at the hotel's restaurant Ambrioso. The sushi was above average, service was ok. Towels were always left out after Derek left for those who wanted to stay out later or to take a midnight dip! Smoothies are complimentary, and all other drinks are reasonably priced (bottles of cold water for free). There is a very limited selection of alcohol. They offer fresh fruit (apples, oranges) and several bottles of sunscreen to all guests. There are always chairs available until happy hour, when it starts to fill up. When Derek isn't there; however, Summer takes over (Sat/Sun). Next to Derek, it looks like she offers no service. It's not that she was bad, she was just ok. She had an attitude with my father when he tried to make small talk as she made her drink and spent alot of her time on her phone. On one of the days she was working, they ran out of pool towels. I'm not sure whose responsibility it was to replace them but it happened regardless. We did get muffins (banana or blueberry) which were very good but we couldn't eat anymore after about day 3, dove chocolates during the turndown service and dove ice cream chocolate bars. They offered dish detergent, laundry deteregent, sponges, paper towels in addition but they are not free as everyone has described. They are included in a $15 per day amenitiy fee that I do not believe you can opt of out. I was a little annoyed to see that at check out. Why not just add it to the room rate? The hotel is near Duval but it is a long walk esp in the August heat. We rented scooters from Summer to get around and we had a blast on them. We did wish we had rented them through Derek. Derek rented one to a friend of ours a few days earlier. His suggestion was cheaper and they delivered the scooter to the hotel. They also have beach access with your room key a block or two down but we never went since we enjoyed Derek's drinks by the pool too much ;) Summer checked us out and we were missing half of our bill; although she graciously offered to hold our luggage and encouraged the use of the hotel's faciilities until our flight which was much later in the day. All in all, we had a great vacation. I wouldn't mind coming back, but my parents have said that they will see what the Mariott is like next time. To each his own, I guess.

Reviews.Title: “A truly wonderful place to stay!”
Reviews.Author: ChrisR451
Reviews.Content: Our family of 4 stayed here for 5 nights and it was a really, really great choice for us. Our kids are older so the 2 floor suite was perfect for us. The staff are some of the best we have encountered and went out of their way to help -- from extra lines to helping us setup activities. The location worked very well from what was right there to easy access to the rest of the key. Really don't think you could go wrong with this as a choice for a stay in Key West! --ChrisR

Reviews.Title: “quiet luxury,old world charm”
Reviews.Author: nana5California
Reviews.Content: The attention to details was fabulous!!!!!!!!!We hung around the pool more than we would have on other trips. Derek the consierge went out of his way in taking care of our needs. The fruit smothies,extra water,restaurant tips plus the usual things like booking excursions. The suites are great and kitchens have everything you could need if you feel like cooking here. The best part? This is at the opposite end of all of the hotels,the wharf and marina so if you are looking for quiet luxury,you will find it here.

Reviews.Title: “Chic and cozy”
Reviews.Author: Wootinola
Reviews.Content: My boyfriend and I went to key west for my 40th bday. We stayed at the Santa Maria after reading reviews on trip advisor. Upon check in I had a couple of issues that I will not mention because they were handled so swiftly and appropriately I was pleased. The rooms are as beautiful as the pictures....however they are all not as large. I would say they are more on the European scale as far as compact. They were beautiful and just right for us. I must note that we got the 2bedroom suite for 2people and used the second room for the computer and my boyfriend used that bathroom to shave etc.- we were able to spread out is my point. It was very convenient to everything and the staff was extremely friendly. And yes they deliver dove ice cream and muffins and chocolates daily. Another nice surprise was the fact that there was free bottled water and smoothies at the pool the entire time it was open. That was a very nice touch that we used every single day. It was the details that made this place so great. Another nice surprise was the attached small sushi restaurant named Ambrosia. If you are a sushi fan you will not be disappointed in flavor or presentation. We would definitely stay here again! Thanks again to Steve, Summer, and Derek!

Reviews.Title: “Santa Maria Suites; A Study for All in Customer Service”
Reviews.Author: janiecap
Reviews.Content: Santa Maria Suites Resort is a beautiful, peaceful retreat in busy Key West! My husband and I have always wanted to visit Key West, and after reading hundreds of reviews on different hotels in the area, we chose the Santa Maria Suites Resort. We made a great choice! We arrived two hours before check-in, hot and tired from driving. No problem! We were invited to park our car in the hotel lot and prompted to enjoy the amenities of the resort while waiting for our suite. At the pool we met Derek, the concierge. Derek, obviously, loves his job and people! We ordered drinks (alcohol, all other non-alcoholic beverages are complimentary), and when he presented us with the tab to sign, we remembered we didn't have our room yet. Again, no problem! "We'll catch up with you when you check-in." Wow, who says that! Derek became a fast friend who has a wealth of knowledge about Key West and all activities, restaurants, and places of interest! At 3 p.m. we met Ken "till ten" Kirkpatrick. Ken wanted to make sure we had the best suite available for us. At the Santa Maria Suites it's all about YOU! We were shown two suites by the manager, Steve Mungalle. When the first suite was not quite where we wanted to be, he walked us to the perfect suite. We have never been to a hotel or resort where the manager takes the time to walk you around and ensure your satisfaction. Again, awesome customer service! Our suite was fabulous! It was equipped with all of state-of-the-amenities listed on the website! (We could only dream of these for our home or Florida condo.) The list is too numerous to mention. Our suite, 15, had a beautiful view of the pool, king-sized bed with fantastic sheets, private balcony, state-of-the-art kitchen, washer and dryer, double sink vanity and double rainfall shower heads, etc., etc.! Every evening fresh muffins, Dove Bars and Dove Chocolates were delivered to our room! After a wonderful meal at restaurants suggested by Derek and Ken, we satisfied our "sweet-tooth" cravings with one of these delicious treats! On our last night in Key West, we wanted to experience an authentic Cuban Restaurant. Ken recommended El Siboney, 900 Catherine St. Off we went; however, we just couldnâ€™t follow his explicit directions. When we called the hotel, Ken stayed on the phone until we got there! Again, who does this! Obviously, the staff at the Santa Maria Suites; and for sure Ken â€œtill tenâ€� does! We made it and the food was out of this world! This resort is the ultimate in customer service! Good HR and good training; it appears both are evident at Santa Maria Suites. Maybe schools such as Olin, Sloan, Harvard, Wharton, and Stern could look into the policies of Santa Maria Suites to help their students become great hoteliers; in a word, FABULOUS! Thanks!

Reviews.Title: “Rare Gem”
Reviews.Author: Wldcolboy
Reviews.Content: This place is truly exceptional. Not only is it beautiful, clean, first class and very conveniently located, the Staff are also exceptional. The service industry, whether it be airlines, hotels or whatever too often anymore accepts average as a standard to aspire too. Not so at the Santa Maria Suites. The hotel industry could learn from these folks. From the front office, Christy and either Kevin or Keith (can't remember the name sorry!) to the concierge Derek, these people try very hard to please. A first class operation. We will definitely be back. Mike & Anita. Atlanta, Georgia.

Reviews.Title: “AWESOME PLACE!”
Reviews.Author: 10isguy
Reviews.Content: The best place to stay in Key West. Not a negative thing to say!

Reviews.Title: “Will definitely be back”
Reviews.Author: Jodie99
Reviews.Content: A great boutique hotel with modern interior and great amenities! Who doesn't love free smoothies, icecream and water upon your arrival! The staff are very friendly and the hotel is a quick 10 minute drive to Mallory square where all the action happens. So it was nice to not have to worry about the noise when we got back to our room. We will definitely reccommend this hotel to our friends and stay here again when we come back!

Reviews.Title: “One of the best!”
Reviews.Author: SFLGirl703
Reviews.Content: Went to KW for a girls get away and stayed at Santa Maria. We had a two bedroom suite for our party of three. The suites are very nicely decorated - modern, sleek and clean. The beds were comfortable (so was the pullout couch) and 2 1/2 baths was perfect for three women. The staff is also absolutely wonderful. When we checked in we were greeted by Ken, who promptly offered us something from the happy hour menu and escorted us to meet Derek by the pool. Derek is absolutely one of the best hotel staff members that I've had the pleasure of meeting. He's friendly and so helpful. The other young lady that works in the pool area on the weekends was great too. Santa Maria emphasizes the small details and I think that's what really sets the hotel apart from others. The complimentary pool side happy hour, free smoothies all day, nightly dove bars/chocolates/muffins and turn down service are great complements to the friendly staff, location and nicely decorated, well maintained rooms. We loved our stay and can not wait to return to Santa Maria!

Reviews.Title: “Great Place, Great Rooms, Great Location!”
Reviews.Author: cicero59
Reviews.Content: We loved our two bedroom suite. We are a family of 5 and found this to be perfect for us. The rooms are beautiful, modern and extremely well appointed. We loved having the kitchen and we had two kings which was perfect for us. I would highly recommend this to others. We loved Derek at the concierge he was very helpful and friendly. We loved the wine at happy hour and our kids loved the smoothies all day long. The location was perfect and the rooms are so sound proof we never heard a thing. Just what you want on vacation. All the staff was friendly we would definitely stay here again if we were to return.

Reviews.Title: “I would like to stay longer!”
Reviews.Author: Kaki_mari
Reviews.Content: Outsanding hotel. Room is better than perfect, large bedrooms excellent beds, outstanding equipment - tv s in each bedroom and salon, real laundry with washing machine and drying machine, full y Ã©quiped kitchen including friche and freezer. Everything is beautiful, design furnished.... There s no breakfast but free tea and cofee in the suite, plus fresh muffins dÃ©libÃ¨res every morning for tour NeXT breakfast. On top it s vert central so that you have excellent restaurants or take away s d'or every meal at a 5 minutes walk. A lot of family with kids, excellent pool area, very relaxing and 2 bedrooms suites are perfect for familles. Excellent concierge service that arrange tour leisure. This ressort CAN easily compete with mots of 5 *.

Reviews.Title: “Superb!”
Reviews.Author: Gowerfarm
Reviews.Content: Fantastic accommodation, excellent service. Huge thanks to Derek the concierge for his wealth of knowledge and patience in making the best iced coffee - delicious! Kids age 16,15 and 10 had a ball.

Reviews.Title: “Our stay was excellent - 2 bedroom suite”
Reviews.Author: shevchja
Reviews.Content: From the moment we checked it, we found nothing but friendliness and helpfulness. Wolfgang gave us the break down on what to expect in the hotel area as well as some local night life. We found everything he told us to be very helpful at some point during our stay. The rooms were sized well enough for us and at no time did we have any trouble. The only hotel room change I would make is a larger coffee pot. We had a two bedroom suite, but the coffee pot made 2 cups. While sitting by the pool we found Derek and Summer to be very friendly and helpful in booking events. They made you feel as though they could not do enough for you. The pool area itself was very relaxing. The smoothies and the happy hour were a definite bonus that we learned of in our stay. Unfortunately we did not get to try Ambrosia Restaurant during our stay. From the outside though, it appeared to be very refined. We stayed here a total of 3 nights and have no complaints about any of them from checking in, staying, relaxing, parking and checking out. I recommend this place to anybody looking to relax and unwind.

Reviews.Title: “can not wait to go back”
Reviews.Author: norab_11
Reviews.Content: A great place to call "home" base in Key West. Full kitchen, two bathrooms, washer and dryer and large closets to hang your clean clothes. Great glass wall patios right off your private living room to sit and have a drink. Wonderful staff. Free smoothies by the pool and chocolate in your fridge every night! Did I mention the decor...beautiful, modern, cozy and functional. This place was done right and they keep doing right.

Reviews.Title: “Great family trip, thanks to Nordy!”
Reviews.Author: wenders103
Reviews.Content: This was a great family trip! :)) The Santa Maria was in a great location near the Southernmost Point and Duval Street. The room was very nice and clean. I'd request the one floor room next time because it was roomier than the split level. We had the BEST concierge! His nickname was Nordy and he was sooo helpful. Our trip wouldn't have been as near as fun or eventful without him. He informed us of all the great restaurants and excursions and booked everything for us. He even gave us his cell in case we needed anything when he was off! I would stay here again in the future, if Nordy was working of course!

Reviews.Title: “Loved this chic place”
Reviews.Author: Powerhugs
Reviews.Content: Took a chance and booked this boutique hotel located on the quieter end of Duval Street. I was fortunate enough to get one of the 2-Bedroom Suites right off the pool. It was nicer that my own apartment and loved the personal touches that they give you each night..The water and the dove chocolate bars and those blueberry muffins....The pool area is alot of fun and the concierge provides you with most any free drink during the day..there is even a happy hour for hotel guests..The only negative thing is the hotel restaurant -japanese-has limited hours both for lunch and dinner so I missed eating there...Can't wait to go back..

Reviews.Title: “Absolutely loved it and we'll be back!”
Reviews.Author: donnjo
Reviews.Content: I just returned from a trip with my daughters (ages 23-24), staying at the Santa Maria was amazing! The concierge staff, Nordie, Derek, Summer, all of them, were so helpful in meeting all of our requests/trips! The 2 bedroom suite we had was beautiful and extremely clean! This is the first time I've ever written a review, they truly deserve one. Reading the reviews on trip advisor was the main reason I picked Santa Maria, plus the fact I loved the suite layout! We are definitely making this an annual trip and will be staying at Santa Maria!

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Location, Highly recommend”
Reviews.Author: SoonerOK
Reviews.Content: We loved our stay at Santa Maria Suites. We traveled with another couple and had a 2 bedroom suite. The suite was roomy and very clean. The location was excellent. We could walk to everywhere we went. We enjoyed the private beach that guests could use (just across the street from the hotel) as well as the pool at the hotel. The hotel was a great value. Two thumbs up!

Reviews.Title: “can not fault these suites in any way--fabulous value”
Reviews.Author: licksmith
Reviews.Content: Arrived on 24th june for 3 nights and what a fabulous choice we had made in picking this accomondation. Fabulous bedroom and en-suite , great 2nd bedroom,spacious lounge , superb high tech fully fitted kitchen , pull out drawer fridges and freezers all totally spotless, 3 big flat screen tv's and your own private small patio and free parking. Got told off by staff because we bought washing powder and water from the supermarket as it's all included , run out and they just keep topping it up--free fresh muffins , chocolates and ice creams delivered daily and for a mere $15 a day all 4 of us had an endless supply of freshly made smoothies and fruit by the pool not excluded the freeby wine on tap late afternoon-- super quiet aircon in the suites and beds and pillows to die for---Some may feel at the southern most point its too far away from the lively end of duval street and mallory square we loved it and again great staff , couldn't have been more helpful if they tried-- great great choice-- would love to return and stay longer on our next visit-- real home from home about the place

Reviews.Title: “100% Satisfaction!”
Reviews.Author: haaland0421
Reviews.Content: What a fantastic property! If you can't be satisfied here, there's really no being satisfied. From the outstanding staff to the super cleanliness of the property....this is a top rate spot. Derek at the pool goes beyond the "call of duty" to take care of the Santa Maria clients with his detailed information and excellent drink mixes! The set up of the condo/apartment is just great and allows privacy for couples. The rooms are separated by a decent hallway and each has its own bath. There's a half-bath down stairs, along with washer/dryer and a nice living/seating area. Fully stocked kitchen with evening turndown service and muffins dropped off for breakfast the next morning. Oh, and they have the BEST ceiling fans in the bedrooms! If you like wind, these babies do the trick! I'd like to find some of these for my home! If we ever go back to Key West, this is the only place I'd consider staying. Truly a top notch property!

Reviews.Title: “Even better then the reviews this hotel was close to perfection.”
Reviews.Author: audiemurphy1
Reviews.Content: After reading the many reviews of places to stay in Key West we chose the Santa Maria Suites. We could not have made a better choice. My wife and I stayed in a two bedroom suite with my parents. While we were initially worried about spending a romantic week long vacation sharing a room our fears faded immediately upon seeing the suite. The bedrooms are on opposite sides of the suite and offer total privacy. The king size bed was very comfortable and the large, dual rain head shower was delightful. The shower in the second bedroom was a standard stand alone shower with a rainhead. There were large flat screen tvs in each bedroom and the living room. The kitchen was large, beautiful, and fully stocked with pots, pans, etc... The living room offered stools for the breakfast bar, a love seat, and 2 chairs to view the tv (equipped with a dvd player). Located on the premises is the sushi restaurant Ambrosia. Ambrosia is a 5 star Japanese restaurant that offered the best sushi I have ever eaten. Simply amazing. The resort has two smallish saltwater pools separated by a walkway. The pools were clean and inviting each day. The deepest part of each pool is only four feet. Smoothies are served all day, for free, by the pool and were a tasty treat. At the pool bar was the concierge Derrick. Derrick did everything for us from suggesting amazing restaurants and attractions that shouldn't be missed to making reservations, and getting us taxis. He booked an amazing sunset cruise and our snorkeling adventure. His amazing knowledge of the island and work ethic really made our vacation that much better! The resort is located on the quiet side of the island a block away from all the noise, nestled near the ocean. While the resort has no beach of its own they have an agreement with the hotel next door to use their beach, a 4 minute walk away. Derrick said we just needed to show our room keys and free use of the beach and lounge chairs were ours. Derrick was correct. The people at the beach were very kind and quickly arranged two chairs for our use. The parking lot at the resort is very tight. We made the mistake of flying in to Fort Lauderdale and driving down to Key West. I would strongly recommend against this instead flying directly into Key West. I would also recommend against renting a car unless you plan to explore the other keys. On Key West parking is so limited and expensive that walking or employing a cab made more sense. We did not use our rental car once after our arrival. The only slight negative I have to offer is the housekeeping should have been better. With that said I would stay at the Santa Maria Suites again in a heartbeat.

Reviews.Title: “2nd Time Was Just As Good As The 1st”
Reviews.Author: MiamiLawGirl
Reviews.Content: We love the Santa Maria. Gorgeous suite overlooking the pool. As soon as you drive up you just feel relaxed. The room and bathrooms were spectacular. Wonderfully comfortable bed. Loved the cheese and cracker and smoothies they provide by the pool. My husband and I love the Santa Maria and our second visit was just as wonderful as the first.

Reviews.Title: “Great stay”
Reviews.Author: Barco44
Reviews.Content: Stayed at the SMS in April with the family and accomodations (2BR/2bath) were perfect for the 5 of us. Kitchen allowed us to eat breakfast/lunch in most days and comp drinks/snacks for the kids all day was a nice bonus. Had a corner room with lots of balcony space, although most of it looked out onto Simonton and South Streets. Location is great but can be a long walk up Duval in midday heat or after a long day/night. Only negative would be size of pool area and not enough free space for 3 teenage boys. We've stayed at Southermost on Beach in past and being a bigger propery it has more room and activities to keep kids interest. Can't compare to SMS for accomodations though.

Reviews.Title: “A great place to unwind”
Reviews.Author: Lamaroo
Reviews.Content: This was our first stopping point having arrived via Miami airport at 10.30pm. We were greeted by the duty manager who was incredibly polite and welcoming, almost too much after 11 hours travelling! Settling down to a couple of drinks on the loungers outside our suite it was heavenly. Very warm and humid, but not overly so. Each ground floor suite is fairly well screened from it's neighbours by the trees and plants. The first thing you notice is how small and intimate the complex is. I had the impression it would be much larger than it actually was and this was a very pleasant surprise. The rooms themselves were incredibly comfortable and cool although when in Key West you don't actually want to spend much time in your room. The hotel is situated at the far end of Simonton St away from the hustle and bustle of Mallory Sq, which for us was great. Best of both worlds. It was only a 15 minute walk to the action. The pool area was great for unwinding after a day out and the staff were amazingly hospitable and couldn't do enough for you. We stayed 3 nights and it was the perfect place to unwind and prepare for the next 18 days travelling around the State! On the whole, it probably exceded our expectations. Dislikes: none for us, although if there had been alot of young children running around then the intimacy might have been too much. We'll never know! Would I go back again? Absolutely, YES

Reviews.Title: “Exceeded expectations straight across the board!”
Reviews.Author: Tangnificent
Reviews.Content: The Santa Maria Suites gave us an amazing experience for the 5 days and nights that we stayed there. The staff was outstanding, notably Wolfgang (nightshift) and Derek (concierge). Wolfgang has got to be the most jovial person on the island and was full of good advise. It was always a pleasure to stop in and see him at the end of a long day that went into a late night. He assisted us with every request and helped us to plan our next day as well. Derek was the go to guy for our daily excursions and he was a terrific pool side bartender! Very knowlegeable, friendly, and made some mean smoothies. The room was everything we had seen online and so much more. This is a true suite and upscale at that. Houskeeping was sharp and on the ball and turn down service was on the minute every night. Internet was good, cable channels were abundant, and the in room amenties were plentiful. Morning muffins were tastey and apples and oranges were ample (from Derek of course). The location is very close to the south end of Duvall street which we hit nightly and far enough away from the noise. The beach access was less than a block away and was clean. All in all this was a perfect place to stay and made our trip everything that we had hoped it would be.....and then some!

Reviews.Title: “AWESOME place to stay.......”
Reviews.Author: timmyjimmy5150
Reviews.Content: A terrific place to stay.... We'll be back!! The rooms were awesome and the hotel is in a great location........

Reviews.Title: “Terrific Hotel in a Great Location”
Reviews.Author: EliasBoston
Reviews.Content: Very chic modern hotel. We had a two bedroon suite with another couple, which makes the cost reasonable Beautiful bathrooms. Great living room/kitchen area, balcony or patio (if ground floor), ice cream bars in freezer, muffin delivered to your room for breakfast, and afternoon wine and cheese. The hotel has a lovely pool on the premises and rights to a beach a short walk away. Also, Duval Street is a block away. Would definitely stay there again. Also there's a great restaurant about a block away right on the ocean, Louie's Back Yard: fabulous views and food.

Reviews.Title: “Everybody gets a different Price”
Reviews.Author: nothappy090
Reviews.Content: I stay @ the Santa Maria Suites in April 2011 with my wife & daughter & son in law & our two grandchildren , I booked a reservation ahead but had to change to different date , i was charged i cancelation fee equal to the full price of the rooms even thought I book another date / but when I arrvied for my stay the gave me a new price for the rooms / I also noted that everybody pays a diffrent price for the same rooms , I suggest you go to another hotel where you can be treated honestly & fairly. Rooms are not clean also.

Reviews.Title: “Can't wait to go back!”
Reviews.Author: ShadeyLady
Reviews.Content: We recently took a trip to Key West and stayed at the Santa Maria Suites, this place is a hidden jewel. There aren't many hotels that offer so many amenities; this will keep us coming back. The Suite was absolutely perfect (spotless), great for a group of people. There were four us in the Suite but there was plenty of room for more. A full kitchen and basically a maid service at your beck and call. There is a small convenient store, restaurant and bike/scooter rental kiddie corner from us. We were also within walking distance to downtown Duval (within .5-1mile). I can not wait to go back and we will definitely be staying here again!!!!

Reviews.Title: “we loved it”
Reviews.Author: godessoftravel
Reviews.Content: We loved the hotel. Our suite was very well done and beautiful, very comfortable beds. the choclates and ice cream at night was a great touch. The staff was wonderful and the pool was very nice with the smoothies and the happy hour. Very convenient to the beach which had lounge chairs for us. We all said we would stay again. Our only problem was clean linens did not come until late in the day and with no wash cloths even asking for them several times. We were ther over several days and on Sunday the cleaning tem got to our room very late in the afternoon when we were ready for a nap and showers before going out. Otherwise the staff was great and so was the stay. Thank you!

Reviews.Title: “Practically Perfect”
Reviews.Author: JeannineinGulfport
Reviews.Content: Just returned from a three night stay at Santa Maria Suites. When I say practically perfect, I mean it! Derek was our concierge and took excellent care of us. The rooms are beautiful and comfortable. However, it is about a mile away from the night life on Duval Street. If I were to make any suggestions, it would be as follows: Put an eight to twelve cup coffee maker in the rooms, upgrade the toilet paper to 2 ply (petty, I know, but still) and please please, add another kind of muffin instead of just blueberry.

Reviews.Title: “Ideal for groups”
Reviews.Author: EAB1707
Reviews.Content: Just returned from a perfect stay at the Santa Maria with a group of four friends. The entire staff was genuinely helpful and friendly, their recommendations made our stay in Key West even better. The hotelâ€™s restaurant was also very good if you like sushi. Already looking forward to another visit!

Reviews.Title: “The Absolute Best in Key West!”
Reviews.Author: BeeBop68
Reviews.Content: I booked the Santa Maria Suites for my annual girls trip for 5 "40-something" friends from TN. As we usually travel to Abaco in the Bahamas, finding the perfect place in Key West that could accomodate us and give us everything we were looking for at a fair price was a bit daunting. From the first time I called Santa Maria Suites to check availability and pricing until our tearful goodbye to return to our everyday lives, the experience at Santa Maria Suites was wonderful. The suites were PERFECT for our party of 5. Very spacious, top of the line furniture and appliances including the most comfortable pull out sofa ever, great ammenities (granite countertops, spacious freezer/refrigerators, washer/dryer, smoothies at the pool, free happy hour, pools, Wi-Fi, etc.). The best thing of all is Derek the Concierge. Simply put, he is the perfect person for this job. He arranged our bicycle rentals, dinner recommendations and reservations, helped us find the best beaches, brought us fresh fruit, fruit smoothies, and bottled water to our pool lounge chairs when he knew we were too "wilted" to walk the 20 steps to the pool bar, etc. He is a true gem and fun to get to know and talk to. He seemed genuinely interested everyday to hear all about the stories and people we had encountered on our adventures on Duval. We are already counting down the days to hopefully return to the Santa Maria Suites next year! We visited the Westin, Hyatt, Southernmost Hotel on the Beach, Parrot Key Resort, and Casa Marina while on our trip (lunches, happy hour, bike drive-throughs, etc.) and the Santa Maria Suites is suburb to all! Rent a bike or scooter and you will have a great time!

Reviews.Title: “Great setting, great room, great staff!”
Reviews.Author: ScienceTraveler3773
Reviews.Content: From greeting to goodbye everything was perfect! Lots of complimentary goodies throughout the day and evening such as water and smoothies by the pool, ice cream, chocolates and coffee in the room. And we can't forget happy hour by the pool each evening. We will definitely stay here again next time we visit Key West!

Reviews.Title: “Absolutely lovely, convenient - a must in Key West”
Reviews.Author: SNLBL
Reviews.Content: I stayed at the Santa Maria Suites just last week (April 2011) and had a fabulous time. The suite itself was ultra modern, had multiple balconies with great views of the pool (although I'm not sure all suites have this) and looked practically brand new. The pool area isn't huge but was very nice and clean. And they provided pool towels so (now we know) no need to bring any with you. The whole place felt very homey and the staff made us feel very comfortable (shout out to Derek and Wolfie!). I especially loved the daily muffin and ice cream delivery. In addition to the general amenities, the location was great. It is on the far south end of Duval but a very short walk from the heart of it all. When booking this trip - and never having been to Key West - I was concerned that getting to the best part of Duval would be too far of a walk but I didn't find that to be the case. The location was far enough away that the surroundings are very peaceful but definitely close enough to the hot spots. I don't have a bad word to say about Santa Maria Suites and it will definitely be our go-to place next time we travel to Key West.

Reviews.Title: “Fabulous! Far exceeded our expectations.”
Reviews.Author: boat57
Reviews.Content: We stayed at the Santa Maria Suites over Easter (4/23 - 4/26/11) and fell in love with it!! Everything from the welcoming, helpful staff (Christie the concierge is amazing!) to the beautifully landscaped pool area to our comfortable, immaculate 2 bedroom pool-side suite were perfect! We enjoyed all the little special touches - the fresh baked muffins left in our rooms during the evening turn-down service, the free wine & humus during happy hour 4 - 5:30PM every day, the treats in our freezer replenished daily, the live steel drum music on Saturday afternoon, the list goes on & on. I guess because the hotel is so small, the staff is able to make their guests feel very special w/out being intrusive. No hassles about pool towels or lounge chairs. We loved the quiet location - a one minute walk to a small public beach and an enjoyable stroll to the busier part of town (takes 20 or 30 minutes depending on how often you stop for "refreshments" along the way!) We WILL definitely return to the Santa Maria on our next trip to Key West!!

Reviews.Title: “Not one negative thing to say about the Santa Maria - we will be back!!!”
Reviews.Author: cab1002
Reviews.Content: This place is true to every positive review on here. I couldn't find one negative thing about this hotel. From the time we walked in the lobby and met Ken to the day we left saying goodbye to Derek - our stay was superb! The pool and gardens are immaculant, plenty of parking. We had a 2 level suite - you know how sometimes you see pictures on a website and then you get there and say "where is that place that I saw online?" Well, the pictures on the website are true to what you will find here. The suite was beautiful, quiet, comfortable - luxurious! Washer/dryer, 3 bathrooms, 3 flat screens - truly amazing kitchen - very very modern. You really do get ice cream every night - I don't know why I thought this couldn't be true, but it is! Water and smoothies by the pool- yes all true and awesome. Small workout room, but ideal if you just want to do a quick workout. NOW, most importantly - Derek was absolutely awesome. He booked us on a jet ski tour that was a once in a lifetime experience. Derek went out of his way to make us feel very special. I can't say enough about him! We had dinner at the attached Ambrosia restaurant - we had lobster terriyaki - best I have ever had. A little pricey, but you get what you pay for - best food by far on our entire trip - well worth the price. The pools were great - we swam at 2am - I guess they don't close!!! It was great. Oh, and you can use a private beach down the road and get free lounge chairs just by showing your room key! Like I said, not one negative thing about this place - just perfect. Hope to be back next year!!!! We have already told all of our friends to go to Key West and stay here!

Reviews.Title: “Excellent people, place and service!”
Reviews.Author: Patti3490
Reviews.Content: We had a great trip to Key West, I was traveling with 3 girlfriends and all the staff @ Santa Maria Suites were helpful, fun and always smiling! They really added to the great time we had on our trip. We would recommend this place to everyone, it is worth the money. Location is great too.

Reviews.Title: “Best trip with good friends”
Reviews.Author: moses7777777
Reviews.Content: There were 8 of us who celebrated a big birthday this year who enjoyed our stay at Santa Maria suite. Derek was very helpful with planning our activities. The suites were clean and big. We all had a great time and will always cherish the memories!

Reviews.Title: “A home away from home”
Reviews.Author: Debrob61
Reviews.Content: We recently stayed 7 nights at the Santa Maria Resort. It was one of our most relaxing vacations ever. The room was fabulous - 2 bedrooms and 2 1/2 baths and full kitchen. We were able to eat breakfast and many lunches in as we enjoyed the pool. The location is great - close enough to hot spots, yet quiet and secluded. Staff was friendly and knowledgeable. They arranged bikes for us upon arrival. The only disappointment was the beach. It was a bit smelly and apparently topless. We found the beach at the Taylor state park much nicer.

Reviews.Title: “Very, very disappointed!”
Reviews.Author: Catsyd
Reviews.Content: This was not at all what we were expected. We came for Spring Break with our daughters and have been to KW numerous times. Had read all of the reviews and expected top notch service and amenities. The rooms looked nice with modern decor, but our room was disgusting! The sheets were never changed before we arrived, make up stains in one room and blood in the other. If this wasn't enough, the whole place was dusty. At $500 a night, I think we could get a clean room! After explaining to management, we didn't even get an apology! The pool was very small and not at all what we expected. This establishment may have been acceptable nice 20 years ago, but would NEVER recommend to anyone. We moved our stay to the Westin Resort at Mallory Sq and had a wonderful time with a huge suite that had clean sheets everyday!! A beautiful pool and sunset from the balcony.

Reviews.Title: “Quiet Sanctuary in lively Key West”
Reviews.Author: oneilclan
Reviews.Content: I traveled with three kids, ages 18,16, and 10. My parents, in their 70's, also stayed in a separate bi-level suite. The units, overall facilties, landscaping, and location were all stellar. We stopped at Winn Dixie to stock up on a few daytime necessites. The pool was lovely and Derek took care of us, plus gave great restaurant suggestions (El Siboney, Half Shell Raw Bar). Nordi also set up an electric car service, gave us discount coupons for the aquarium and butterfly sanctuary, and booked us on an unforgettable ferry ride to the Dry Tortugas. I would agree with the one reviewer on the cleaning of the rooms. They cleaned them very late, often after 4. In addition, a couple times they didn't empty the trash. Perhaps there are just not enough to get it done quickly. Otherwise, everything else was impeccable. When there, visit Two Friends Patio, Turtle Kraals, and Rum Barrel for good food and live music.

Reviews.Title: “Best place to stay in Key West!”
Reviews.Author: louloutraveler48
Reviews.Content: We had a two-room suite steps from the pool. We were so pleasantly surprised at how beautiful the room was, as the pictures on the website do not do justice to the actual room. It was more like a condo than a hotel room. We had friends that stayed at a beautiful resort, but every day would come to our room because it was so great to hang out in. The amenities were fantastic, with free water and smoothies by the pool, free muffins and turndown service in the evenings. We were able to walk everywhere as the location was fantastic.

Reviews.Title: “ALREADY WANTING TO GO BACK.”
Reviews.Author: VernHaney
Reviews.Content: There's a reason why their are no terrible reviews.....Santa Maria suites is that good. If your looking for a relaxing stay in a quaint little resort without any stupidity, Santa Maria is your place. Pricey Yes...but you get what you pay for. The 2 bedroom suite was excellent from the marble and tile kitchen and bathrooms to the beautiful grounds. The pool was small but nice. Overall I had no complaints, other than the lacking gym facilities.....but who goes to Key West to workout right. Look forward to returning.

Reviews.Title: “A little piece of heaven”
Reviews.Author: trcyjohnson
Reviews.Content: We recently stayed at the Santa Maria suites in Key West, where our family had a very relaxing and enjoyable stay. The two bedroom, two bath suite was perfect for our family of four, and we can't say enough about the modern amenities, especially the great kitchen, not to mention the three large flat screen t.v.s our children loved. The entire staff went out of their way to see that our stay was a good one. Christie and Derek were especially attentive to our needs at the pool and made some awesome smoothies for our kids. They also booked several excursions for us as well as made great recommendations for dinner. I think we could have stayed by the beautiful pool 24/7. Our kids also loved the nightly room service with fresh muffins for the next morning, chocolates, and ice cream bars. They certainly will miss this luxury, now that we have returned home. We hope to be able to return again in the near future! The Johnson Family

Reviews.Title: “The best of the best.”
Reviews.Author: BuddhaDon
Reviews.Content: It is a beautiful, small and intimate resort. Our suite had everything we could want and the location is fantastic. I am recommending it to everyone I know. We will go back. Key West is wonderful and this resort was unlike anything we have had the privilege of staying at before.

Reviews.Title: “The Santa Maria made our weekend memorable and I cannot think of any other place in Key West that I would stay!”
Reviews.Author: ween2
Reviews.Content: The staff at SM made our experience one of the most memorable weekends! Not only is the hotel new and updated, but as an added bonus, it was always stocked with fresh muffins, chocolates, and ice cream bars! And if that wasnt enough, they gave free snacks and smoothies by poolside as you sit and enjoy the Caribbean style steel drum music. The staff was extremely pleasant and very helpful with answering questions and providing recommendations to great restaurants and local attractions. I would have to say if you could ask for anyone, ask for Wolfgang! He made our group feel important! The hotel is in a great location to the beach, many hot spot bars and restaurants, and the infamous "southernmost point" picture spot! I highly recommend SM and cannot think of another place that I would stay!

Reviews.Title: “Awesome”
Reviews.Author: jonisunshine
Reviews.Content: The hotel was very clean, quiet and the hotel people wwwwere wonderful. Derek, Christie and Ken were always willing to help you wit arranging excursions. Free smoothies and drinks all day long. Fresh muffins every morning in our room. Free Dove Ice Cream brought to our room every evening. The restaurants in the area were wonderful. Were planning a trip back next year around the same time.

Reviews.Title: “Very nice !!!!”
Reviews.Author: missouritravlerjan20
Reviews.Content: My wife and I loved it. Celebrating her birthday we were very pleased with the room, location, pool, and hotel staff. Walk to Mallory Square a long mile but we love to walk. Beach was nice not to crowded in January. We are planning to go back next year.

Reviews.Title: “Believe the hype!”
Reviews.Author: KWgirl2007
Reviews.Content: All the wonderful things said about this hotel are true--the suites are gorgeous and clean, the pool is one of the largest I've seen at a Key West hotel/inn, and the attached sushi restaurant, Ambrosia, is amazing. The staff is friendly and helpful, especially Derek, who makes delicious poolside drinks! I would stay here again in a heartbeat. When you're traveling with a few people, it really is the way to go. You'll save money AND get to stay in one of the nicest resorts on the island! The only possible downfall about this hotel (and it may not be a downfall to some) is the location. It's a little far from the nightlife on Duval Street, but if you don't mind the walk, this probably won't matter to you.

Reviews.Title: “Best hotel ever!!!”
Reviews.Author: travlingroxz
Reviews.Content: I loved this hotel. The staff was great! Very clean and beautiful setting. Superior service. The wonderful staff especially Dereck, really made our stay great! We will definitely stay there again!!!

Reviews.Title: “Sweet Suites!”
Reviews.Author: MsBooks
Reviews.Content: My two girlfriends and I travel together once a year, and are always looking for a suite hotel that has enough bedrooms and baths for a comfortable stay. We hit the jackpot with the Santa Maria Suites in Key West. The two-level, two bedroom suite was perfect for us. Very modern, very clean, quiet, comfortable, and well-located! Arriving in Key West we got directions by phone from the very patient, very charming, very helpful Wolfgang, who even came out to the street to greet us and to make sure we found our destination. We loved the touch of the muffins in the morning and the great ice cream bars for the evenings! They even provided free bottled water. I would recommend this to anyone who wants more space than a typical hotel, and who wants to feed that they've been personally made to feel special.

Reviews.Title: “Absolutely terrific”
Reviews.Author: wilvey
Reviews.Content: The Santa Maria Suites was fabulous - it allowed us to have a family vacation that was actually relaxing. The suite was very clean, nicely designed, and well-equipped. The dishwasher and washing machine were handy as we were traveling with two young children (6 & 8) The staff was so friendly and helpful, especially Derek and Wolfgang. The pool was great for the children, clean, heated, no chemical smell. The landscaping was very well done and provided shade and sun areas, as well as privacy around the patio in front of our ground level suite. Having the Japanese restaurant on site worked well for us. We liked the location and found it easy to walk around town.

Reviews.Title: “Modern, Contemporary Spacious Suites with Warm, Friendly Staff”
Reviews.Author: Travelinghounds
Reviews.Content: Looking for extremely clean, updated modern furnishings, Santa Maria is perfect! Our 2 bedroom, 2.5 bath suite, had gorgeous bathrooms and an extremely modern full kitchen. Roomy and perfect for our girls getaway. The staff was so nice and friendly and always felt like all of our needs were taken care of in a warm and friendly manner. The location was perfect and peaceful. If you do not want to be next to the t-shirt stores, in the middle of the tourist mobs and cruises unloading in Mallory Sq. and love walking everywhere, this is a perfect choice for all. We certainly enjoyed the smoothies, Dove bars and muffins everyday. A nice treat!

Reviews.Title: “Santa Maria Suites KW”
Reviews.Author: KWguy211
Reviews.Content: A letter I sent to Steve Mungall, GM at Santa Maria Suites in Key West, Florida: Mr. Mungall, Donna and I had the great pleasure to visit KW last week and enjoyed all the sites around town, especially 'Old Town'. But, most of all, was our stay at Santa Maria Suites, Key West. Every staff member, from Housekeeping to poolside, to front-desk continued throughout the week to be a pleasure in every regard. Every question - every request was met with enthusiasm and 'friendly concern'. At the front desk: Nordi, Wolf, Kendall, Ken, and Lane (did I miss anyone?) -- were absolutely the BEST, 24-hours a day. At poolside: Derek, and the gal that took-over after Derek on Friday/Saturday, were always at-the-ready to help and show every courtesy and true kindness. Housekeeping: Every staff member of Housekeeping went 'overboard' to assist -- with a warm smile on their faces, well-past the normal service level in any other place we have ever visited. Donna and I have traveled around the States, and other places a bit and have never experienced the quality of service - top-to-bottom - that we had at Santa Maria. Many of our friends have already heard our "KW stories" ---- all of which begin-and-end with 'Santa Maria Suites'. Expect many more guests from frozen Western New York. Once again, many thanks for a wonderful stay and a thoroughly enjoyable week at your place. Best Regards, Dave and Donna Gaylord-Granger

Reviews.Title: “Very Pleased. Will definitely stay here on our next visit”
Reviews.Author: marysarnia
Reviews.Content: The staff was very pleasant and helpful. The rooms were very modern and had everything you could ask for including a washer and dryer and a well-equipped kitchen The pool was beautiful and heated. Muffins, chocolates and ice cream bars were delivered in the evening which was a nice treat. Happy hour with wine and smoothies each afternoon. Very nice location within easy walking distance to Duval St.

Reviews.Title: “Customer Service over the top!!!!”
Reviews.Author: digeary
Reviews.Content: This is a small intimate hotel within minutes of the main part of town. The staff was extraordinary, Concierge extremely knowledgable with many good recommendations. Check them out on their web site, they have a nice Happy hour with wine and snacks, fresh muffins from a local baker for the morning, tiny Dove bars & chocolates for the evening treat. Rooms and bath rooms are spacious and decorated very tastefully, flat screen TV's, sub zero fridge & freezer, very nice kitchen with open floor plan. It is a great spot to be able to relax. When we left we were sad to leave such good folks behind, we extended our stay to 10 days and definitely will be going back. It was like staying with close family (the good kind :>)

Reviews.Title: “5 Nights of Awesome”
Reviews.Author: bllgo
Reviews.Content: Unbelievable in every way. A truly top notch resort experience.

Reviews.Title: “Can't wait to go back to Santa Maria”
Reviews.Author: Kimblondee
Reviews.Content: My husband and I traveled to Key West with another couple and stayed at Santa Maria in a 2 bedroom suite, We had an amazing experience from start to finish. The suite was impeccably clean and so comfortable and stylish. The bedrooms were layed out at each side of the suite so that each couple had plenty of privacy within the suite. We were pleasantly surprized at the laundry room supplied with detergent an all. The extras that were included (smoothies, happy hour, ice cream and bottled water were a major plus). The pool area is spacious, and the pool was heated and very clean. Derek didn't miss a beat was always ready with whatever you might need and had wonderful recommendatins for anything we wanted to do.

Reviews.Title: “Could of been better!”
Reviews.Author: limedish
Reviews.Content: My experience could of better here. Without getting into way to much detail, just know that if you happen to get placed in one of the end units the wireless internet does not work and you need the "BLUE CORD" ! Also none of our tv remotes worked. The staff was not that helpful. And I was charged for drinks at the pool which I never had. They were quick to credit my account but just keep an eye on your final bill. The hotel manger was a nice guy. Would I stay here again, yes.

Reviews.Title: “Best Service and Great Accommodations”
Reviews.Author: akadolla
Reviews.Content: The accommodations are super. The staff was so friendly and helpful, especially Derek who gave us great recreational recommendations. We are definitely going back!

Reviews.Title: “Great Place to Stay”
Reviews.Author: chris811
Reviews.Content: Stayed here with my wife and baby daughter when in Florida for a family wedding in December 2010, before moving onto Orlando. We had a 2 bedroom suite which was well appointed, of a really good size and had everything you would need. The location of the hotel is good, very near to Duval street and the Southernmost point. Our little daughter was not well so we didn't eat out in Ambrosia, but had a take-out which we ate in the kitchen of the suit and the food was really good. The staff were very friendly and helpful. We struggled to get a good connection with the wireless internet and mentioned this to Derrick at the pool bar and he got us a ethernet cable which solved the problem. He also makes a really good smoothy and it is a nice touch that these are inclusive in the resort fee. Unfortunately we didn't get to go to the happy hour, so missed out a bit on that, but overall I would definitely stay here again if we come back to the Keys.

Reviews.Title: “relaxing wonderful stay”
Reviews.Author: beverley61
Reviews.Content: this was the perfect place to be close enough to the main attractions of key west but with a tranquility all of its own. The staff were brilliant nothing was to much trouble loved the choc on my pillow and the icecreams in the freezer, The smoothies by the pool were great and if I was not teatotal I would have enjoyed the wine at sun down The apartment was spotless and had every thing you needed we had a two bedroomed one on the ground floor If we ever return to key west again this is where we will stay for the duration not just 5 days it wasn't long enough

Reviews.Title: “2 Thumbs Up!”
Reviews.Author: TalkGeorge
Reviews.Content: We vacationed Thanksgiving week...have been to Key West many times but this was our first time at Santa Maria~ wonderful, friendly, clean, nice location...no negatives and we'll be back. Kudos to Kendall, Derek, and Ken!

Reviews.Title: “Hotel Facility is Great, Staff is Even Better”
Reviews.Author: des124
Reviews.Content: We recently stayed at Santa Maria Suites in a two bedroom first floor suite. The suite was as nice as it appears on the web site [maybe even nicer] and was spotlessly clean. Huge modern kitchen with all needed accessories, comfortable beds, free wi-fi, muffins for the morning, wine in the afternoon, smoothies by the pool, beach access a block away... great facilities and even better staff. Thanks Kendall!!! Ambrosia, the on site sushi restaurant, is wonderful. The hotel's location at the south end of the island is away from downtown and refreshingly quiet, and bikes are handy if you want quick and east access to all of the restaurants and activities downtown. We had 3 people in our party and needed two rooms in a hotel, so the two bedroom suite arrangement worked out well for us. It was both better and cheaper than renting 2 seperate rooms in a nearby hotel.

Reviews.Title: “don't hesitate, it is as good as the reviews say”
Reviews.Author: abihug
Reviews.Content: just superb, our duplex was stylish & chic with good quality furnishings, comfortable beds, lovely terrace. Great space for parents with independant teenagers. Staff really are amazing, nothing was too much trouble. My husband bought the shirt and spent the rest of our vacation telling everyone how good it was ! Already planning our return

Reviews.Title: “OHH YEA”
Reviews.Author: orly623
Reviews.Content: ok, i had booked a reservation for the HERON HOUSE in Key West, FL for Oct30 for 2nites - when I arrived there was too many rules for us to enjoy our stay because it was pretty much a senior home - i was moved luckily to the SANTA MARIA SUITES - i bkd a 2bdrm Luxury Suite - insane!!!! 2floors - everything modern and clean!!! - 3balconies - complete kitchen {fully renovated} - resort was great!!! i can say anything but good things - check in was easy - they cleaned both nights - gave us air beds for extra guests - I will be coming back soon - great place - great times

Reviews.Title: “Absolute Best trip to Key West”
Reviews.Author: saintsomewhere248
Reviews.Content: My wife and I along with another couple just spent five nights at the Santa Maria and WOW! The suite (we had the bi-level two bedroom) was fantastic. It was super clean with plenty of room and terrific modern furnishings and appliances. The pool area was terrific, with two heated (just right) pools and plenty of space to be in the sun or under a palm tree for shade. The private beach (just a block away) was great too, with lounge chairs and bar right there. Best of all is the staff, especially Derek at the pool and Ken (til 10!). They were always smiling and full of suggestions for dinner, activities etc. You can't go wrong by staying here. It's at the quiet (southern) end of the island but that just gives you a chance to see more of Key West as you make the leisurely stroll towards the "action".

Reviews.Title: “Not quite what we expected”
Reviews.Author: BodaciousBabe
Reviews.Content: After reading the stellar reviews of this hotel on the Trip Advisor website, we decided to forego the big name resort next door and made a reservation at the Santa Maria Suites for a two night stay. The friendly staff checked us in and we made our way with our bags up to our poolside room. The suites are set up like apartments and after we had dragged the bags up the outside stairs and the inside stairs we found the full size (not king as advertised) bed was too big for the tiny room. It was pretty disappointing. We had reserved a 1 bedroom partial oceanview suite. It turns out the actual bedroom of the suite was so small there was barely room to walk around the bed. We kept stubbing our toes on the bed frame which was practically on the ground. There was also no ocean view at all. The shower water pressure in the way too small shower stall was non existent... even by normal key west standards. After attempting to make ourselves comfortable, we realized we would not be able to. Therefore we requested to check out after the first night but they refused to refund our money. However, as an accomodation, they did move us to a 2 bedroom suite and just locked off the second bedroom. That guestroom was on the first floor overlooking the pool. The bedroom was a better size and the bathroom was more comfortable but my back was aching after two nights of sleeping on the uncomfortable mattress. The Santa Maria does attempt to make up for their short comings of the rooms by offering you free drinks at the pool, free water and ice cream treats in the room and free muffins for breakfast in the morning. The intention of a well appointed hotel is there. It just falls a little short.

Reviews.Title: “Amazing, relaxing, modern!”
Reviews.Author: blondehabs
Reviews.Content: Booked trough Small Luxury Hotels. Resort is a small Gem tucked away, located near the southern most point. Only a few staff operating the resort areas, but attended to our every need. We were upgraded to a three story unit, without even asking. Modern and clean suites. Nice pool area with free smoothies during the day. The pool bar even provided free sunblock to me, when I ran out! Pool was quite and tucked in between the resort. Small private beach area just a few steps down the street. Loved this place.

Reviews.Title: “Can't wait to return”
Reviews.Author: contesia
Reviews.Content: Stop reading the reviews and just make the reservations. We stayed in a 2 bedroom suite that was ultra modern, very clean and quiet. There isn't an ocean view, but I don't think it matters. You have access to the beach that is a very short walk from the hotel. The staff is amazing. Entertainment, smoothies, dove bars, muffins all included and added a nice touch. It's located on the southern side of the island, which makes it quiet, but it's not far to duval street - make the 15 minute walk or ride a bike. Restaurants close by and within walking distance.

Reviews.Title: “The Santa Maria is "Da Bomb" !”
Reviews.Author: Sun-and-Ski-Mom
Reviews.Content: Wow - The Santa Maria Suites was just wonderful. My sisters and I have an annual sisters weekend get-together every year in October. This year was special as we were celebrating decade birthdays and so we decided to head to Key West to celebrate. Trip Advisor did not lead us astray when we picked the Santa Maria Suites for our hotel. Oh My Goodness...we were so happy that we did. We stayed in Suite #5 - a two bedroom suite on the ground floor. The furnishings and finishes were just plush. We spent the first fifteen minutes taking pictures and oohing over the rooms. I wish that I had this kitchen in my home. I was totally wowed by the master bathroom with the dual showerheads. My husband, who joined us for this trip, also liked the bathroom quite a bit. This place was perfect for our needs. We caught the trolley just outside of the hotel and did our best souvenir shopping at the the shop across the street. The hotel pools were fantastic and we enjoyed the happy hour wines and the steel drum player. The complimentary muffins were great the first day, but did get a little old by day three. The sushi restaurant adjacent to the hotel was handy for some appetizers to go. We really enjoyed our time at Key West because of this hotel. Some restaurants we liked while we were there included the Blackfin Bistro, Southernmost Cafe, and the Rooftop Cafe. Key West was great and if I come back again, I will definitely stay at this hotel again.

Reviews.Title: “Absolutely Amazing”
Reviews.Author: butchdiesel
Reviews.Content: I went with a group of friends and we had the most amazing time. The hotel has privileges at the only beach in the area. There is free snacks and wine in the afternoons. The staff is very friendly and accommodating. The rooms are amazingly nice and well kept. I wouldn't stay anywhere else. For the cost of one room at any other hotel in Key West you could get a two bedroom suite at the Santa Maria.

Reviews.Title: “GREAT PLACE TO STAY!”
Reviews.Author: keladykman
Reviews.Content: We stayed 3 nigths in the Santa Maria Suites, the place is PERFECT, modern, ultra clean, wonderful staff (very helpful), very quiet, well located just a block to the beach (they provide chairs but not umbrelas, $10 to rent them), free smothies,dove chocolates and ice creams in the fridge, plus all the bottled water you need were some of the things included with the room. The only thing is that they charge you a resort fee, which they don't warn you about when you book the room! But overall we had a wonderful stay, definately two thumbs up!!!

Reviews.Title: “There are not enough stars - to rate high quality of this hotel!”
Reviews.Author: BlueOh
Reviews.Content: My wife and I met another couple for a 3 night stay at the Santa Maria Suites. Cannot say enough about location, quality, attentive/friendly staff and most importantly the excellent accommodations. We travel frequently and this is among the very best rooms we have ever stayed in! High quality throughout, clean and comfortable! Derek (Pool Guy) and Wolfgang (Front Desk) provided excellent service and are a real asset to the hotel. Thanks for a great vacation!

Reviews.Title: “Best Place in Key West”
Reviews.Author: jefryd
Reviews.Content: Beautiful property and suites! the rooms are wonderful and the beds are the best sleeping ever. the staff are exceptionally friendly and helpful - they go beyond duty to book activities and restaurant reservations at excellent places! this is the quiet end of the island, near Duvall and all of the activity, but not in the middle of it. Perfect for us and our adult children. we truly believe it is the best place to stay in Key West, and we will definitely be back!

Reviews.Title: “Great place, I would definitely stay there again.”
Reviews.Author: pioneerdonna
Reviews.Content: It was a girls trip for a long weekend and we are all very particular, so we were hoping the place was nice and clean. It was and so much more. The suites are lovely, very well equipped and very clean. The pool area was great too, with a very nice pool concierge. There is use of a beach area and chaise lounges just one block away (just show your room key). You can take the Santa Maria beach towels to the beach. Great location, great staff - very friendly and helpful with lots of discount coupons to area attractions, clean and well organized. We would definitely stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “First Class Experience”
Reviews.Author: jlhertlein
Reviews.Content: I had the pleasure of staying at Santa Maria Suites in August. When I am in Key West, this will be the only place I stay. The rooms were spacious, clean, and contemporary. We loved the turn down service which included chocolates on the pillows and ice cream. The staff was wonderful. They were more than willing to give advice or help you book an excursion. Dereck by the pool was especially helpful. The place is close to a lot of great restauraunts and there are lots of things to do nearby. This place is highly recomended. Nicest place in town.

Reviews.Title: “Lovely accomodation but pool a bit limited”
Reviews.Author: JJOH
Reviews.Content: We had a lovely stay here for 3 nights in early october. Good points 1) Rooms are beautiful with fabulous fittings, great kitchens that are well stocked for those wishing to use them (although no tin opener!), nice bathrooms, large flatsceen TVs. Couldnt be much better 2) Derek at the pool who provides smoothies etc and some free wine in the afternoon during happy hour. This guy gives faultless advice and could not be any more helpful. I would really trust him to sort out anything you need Less good points 1) We booked through Hotels.com and were informed that because there were 4 in our room we would have to pay an extra $50 per night. Now we had selected the suites on the website and stated there were 4 of us staying in the room. I was given the impression that the hotel are aware of this problem but seem happy to allow it to continue and just ask for additional money just before or when you arrive. Leavs a sour taste in your mouth. 2) Pool a bit on the small side. We were here out of season and in my opinion the pool area would be very congested if the hotel were full. They also allowed groups of young men on a stag do to dominate the pool by drinking beer and smoking large cigars in the pool (Yes IN the pool) which doesnt seem fair On the whole though this is a nice place to stay

Reviews.Title: “Great!”
Reviews.Author: ilove2travel077
Reviews.Content: We stayed at this fabulous hotel after driving for 6 hours straight, and we ere pleasantly surprised. It was great value, fantastic rooms and facilities and the location was amazing - you must stay here if you're in Key West! Unmissible!

Reviews.Title: “Impeccable lodging and service”
Reviews.Author: CBHighland
Reviews.Content: We vacationed for 8 days and expected a great deal from the Santa Maria based on all of the glowing reviews. However, we were more impressed than we expected. The accomodations are so lovely and have everything you need. We knew the kitchen was fully stocked and had state of the art appliances but we did not realize we would have our own washer and dryer too! The staff were so accommodating but Derek made our stay. His recommendations for restaurants were always right and he helped with reservations for kayaking, sailing, snorkeling, etc. He is stationed by the pool and any time we walked by he offered bottled water or free fruit smoothies during the day or free wine in the evening. He is a great asset to Santa Maria..

Reviews.Title: “Great Place - Staff really good”
Reviews.Author: kg08953
Reviews.Content: We stayed here for 2 nights in August 2010. The hotel is great, really pleasant feel to it. The suites themselves are roomy and very well equipped. Pool area excellent not too big, not too small. The staff were fantastic, they could not have been more helpful. Location wise, it's a short walk to the bottom end of Duval so to hit the action it's about a 30 min walk, or a 5 min cab ride. Cabs are plentiful.

Reviews.Title: “Brand New Rooms, Great Service, Relaxed Atmosphere”
Reviews.Author: TravelingFanatics
Reviews.Content: My wife and I just came back from a 3 night stay at Santa Maria suites and really loved the place. Brand new everything, tastefully done, and a fully equipped kitchen. This was not just a kitchen with a few plates and a coffee maker... it had a fully cuisanart cooking set, an amazing fridge built into the counters, a full marble sink island, etc, etc etc. Awesome. We were also upgraded to a 2 bedroom, 2 bath duplex suite, with 3 balconies (one looked over the parking lot, so we didnt use that much, but 2 other balconies faced the pool. 2 Flatscreen TVs. The location was great, 1 block to Duval street, but at the end away from all of the touristy stuff. Walking distance to 3 beaches (2 were lame, 1 was great). Easy parking, easy walk to great restaurants, easy walk to nice residential areas, and much more. With the fully equipped, nicely designed accommodations, we could easily have stayed for 2 weeks in our room...err, apartment. Loved it!

Reviews.Title: “There's no need to stay anywhere else!”
Reviews.Author: Mary959
Reviews.Content: After nearly 20 years of visiting Key West, we have a new favorite place to stay - the Santa Maria Suites on Simonton Street. From the moment we arrived until our departure, the staff helped make our vacation a pure pleasure! Lane and Ken (Til 10), who handled my phone reservation, were just the tip of the superb customer service iceberg that seems to be typical at the Santa Maria Suites. I'm sure I'm omitting names, my apologies to those in the front office I might miss highlighting... Nordecker (sp?) who helped us with parasailing reservations, the ever efficient Jake, Derek - an amazing personality, Stephanie (who hung out with us on her last day), Wolfgang - who was there every night to welcome us "home." Every person who worked the front desk during our stay treated us as though we were the only people who mattered. Also, the housekeeping staff was first rate and the gentleman who came around every evening with muffins and chocolates was a sweetheart. The rooms were even nicer than we expected and though there were families with children (mine being one of them), you never had that feeling of dread that comes with staying at other family oriented resorts - having to deal with the noise, the trash strewn around, the harried housekeepers. The grounds at the Santa Maria Suites were pristine, the guests were respectful, there were no intrusive or annoying gangs of people partying in the adjoining rooms - and even if there were, you couldn't hear them! The pools were beautiful and clean, the foliage and trees were marked with labels so you could tell what they were, and the buildings were immaculate. The staff at the Santa Maria clearly takes pride in their work and it shows. Not only will they get my repeat business, they will also get my highest recommendation to anyone considering a Key West vacation.

Reviews.Title: “Near perfection”
Reviews.Author: WanderingProfessor
Reviews.Content: I made two mistakes when I booked a room at Santa Maria Suites: 1. I should have invited friends to stay with us 2. I should have booked for a longer stay. The rooms are huge and can easily accomodate 4 people, and this hotel is near perfect. I was not completely convinced by Key West as a leisure city, but Santa Maria is a great place to relax by the pool, while drinking complimentary smoothies. A family could easily stay there for a complete week, considering all the equipment in the room, from pots to plates to TVs. There was even a washing machine and a dryer! Don't let this prevent you from visiting the town, El Siboney is a fantastic place for Cuban food. Few hotels have a soul, but the Santa Maria Suites, in the proud tradition of SLH, has a beautiful one. I strongly recommend it for a group of friends looking for a charming, sophisticated place to relax in Florida.

Reviews.Title: “Georgous, Georgous place a must stay when in the keys”
Reviews.Author: diysos63
Reviews.Content: I cannot speak highly enough of the Santa Maria Suites. Everything from being so clean and comfortable to highly professional staff. Easy walking distance to Duval Street and noise but far enough away to be a nice place to relax to in the evening.

Reviews.Title: “A great experience!”
Reviews.Author: bjq03
Reviews.Content: Perfect place (and location) for either seeing the sights of Key West or just staying in the hotel and relaxing. The suites are roomy and comfortable, providing a 'great room" area large enough to host guests, while allowing for privacy with the two separate bedrooms. The kitchen has everything needed to make a meal, or host a party. The staff was courteous and attentive. And I really liked the pool area - with the limited number of rooms in the inn, it was never really crowded. I'd recommend it without hesitation.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent experience!”
Reviews.Author: NCSWerMom
Reviews.Content: We loved everything about this beautiful property! We were greeted by friendly and helpful staff who made us feel instantly welcome. our rooms were upscale and comfortable, with caring extras like muffins every morning and ice cream treats and chocolates every evening. the free fruit smoothies by the pool were another special treat that let you know the people at Santa Maria care about making you feel special. the location, the accommodations, the warm and welcoming staff, the beautiful landscaping - we will make Santa Maria our place to stay in Key West, and highly recommend it to others!

Reviews.Title: “Hotel was good. If your looking to get papmped then look elsewhere!”
Reviews.Author: goodshink
Reviews.Content: This hotel is good at best. It is great for a family looking to save money on meals. The room is huge. I would stay here again with my kids but I do not recommend this hotel for a couple. Try to get me to book excursions at a so-called discounted rate but you can get them cheaper in town. I know it's my fault and I should have requested a new room but we were settled in and didn't want to move. I did complain and they came and killed worms but they returned next day. Overall this hotel is nice and definitely quiet but #1 in Key West I think Trip Advisor has this one wrong. Pros: Room was huge and it had a great kitchen. The hotel is very quiet with very few children. Pool area is beautiful and relaxing. Great sushi restaurant on site. Free parking. Free smoothies at pool. Cons: Room was dirty and had worms in the shower. Didn't help with bags. No personal service. Had to get up for smoothies at pool no waiter or waitress service. Hotel is far away from Mallory Square. Tip: Rent a moped to get around town. Shop prices you will be amazed at differences. If you have your own M/V then bring several dollars in .25 pieces. Parking @ meters is .25 per 10 minutes.

Reviews.Title: “So good I was almost afraid to tell others...”
Reviews.Author: Roxbury02
Reviews.Content: After spending hours in front the computer trying to decide on which hotel to stay at, restaurant to eat in, and place to visit, I can honestly say that Santa Maria made it worth every second. Just to give you the background of my trip: it was just my girlfriend and I and the purpose of the trip was to propose marriage (which she said yes to by the way). In spite of some of the worst weather the area had seen (so I was told by many locals) in ten years, we made the best of our first visit to the Keys and will definitely stay another visit with Santa Maria Suites. We showed up to a warm welcome by the front desk staff where he gave us a rundown of the hotel and Island. Following this, we preceded to our hotel room, which cannot be described in words in regard to its awesomeness (atleast not my words). We stayed on the second floor facing the pool, but really either the second or first floor would have been great (as long as it faced the pool as I do believe there are a few rooms which do not). One of the most attractive things to me and my now wife was the peacefulness. Santa Maria seems to have the service and "spectacle" of a large resort but without the noise and high foot traffic/crowds. Of course, this all comes at a price, which brings me to my last point: the only thing that I would EVER classify as a deterrent for staying here would be the price. However, if you want it to be a special occasion like we did, then it is completely worth it. After all, you only live once!!

Reviews.Title: “The only reason to return to Key West - terrific place”
Reviews.Author: Moosemug
